S04n462:1: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapaṃ tāṃścānyān sthavirān mahāśrāvakānāmantrayāmāsa-sādhu sādhu mahākāśyapa |
S04n462:2: sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtān guṇavarṇān bhāṣadhve |
S04n462:3: ete ca kāśyapa tathāgatasya bhūtā guṇāḥ |
S04n462:5: yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ paryanto'dhigantumaparimitānapi kalpān bhāṣamāṇaiḥ |
S04n462:8: yaṃ ca kāśyapa tathāgato dharmaṃ yatropanikṣipati,
S04n462:14: sarvadharmārthavaśitāprāptaḥ sarvadharmādhyāśayaprāptaḥ sarvadharmaviniścayakauśalyajñānaparamapāramitāprāptaḥ sarvajñajñānasaṃdarśakaḥ sarvajñajñānāvatārakaḥ sarvajñajñānopanikṣepakaḥ kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ||
S04n462:15: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāvantastṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo nānāvarṇā nānāprakārā oṣadhigrāmā nānānāmadheyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātāḥ parvatagirikandareṣu vā |
S04n462:18: saṃchādya ca sarvatra samakālaṃ vāri pramuñcet |
S04n462:21: sarve te tato mahāmeghapramuktādvāriṇo yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayamabdhātuṃ pratyāpibanti |
S04n462:22: te caikarasena vāriṇā prabhūtena meghapramuktena yathābījamanvayaṃ vivṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāmāpadyante,
S04n462:24: te ca pṛthak pṛthagū nānānāmadheyāni pratilabhante |
S04n462:25: ekadharaṇīpratiṣṭhitāśca te sarve oṣadhigrāmā bījagrāmā ekarasatoyābhiṣyanditāḥ |
S04n462:26: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate |
S04n462:28: tathā tathāgato'pyutpadya sarvāvantaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ svareṇābhivijñāpayati |
S04n462:29: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātumavacchādayati,
S04n462:30: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata evaṃ śabdamudīrayati,
S04n462:36: ahamimaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ samyak prajñayā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmi sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī |
S04n462:39: tatra kāśyapa bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatasya dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti |
S04n462:40: atha tathāgato'pi teṣāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryaparāparavaimātratāṃ jñātvā tāṃstān dharmaparyāyānupasaṃharati,
S04n462:41: tāṃ tāṃ dharmakathāṃ kathayati bahvīṃ vicitrāṃ harṣaṇīyāṃ paritoṣaṇīyāṃ prāmodyakaraṇīyāṃ hitasukhasaṃvartanakaraṇīyām |
S04n462:42: yayā kathaya te sattvāḥ dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavanti,
S04n462:46: śrutvā ca taṃ dharmaṃ vigatanīvaraṇā bhavanti |
S04n462:47: anupūrveṇa ca sarvajñadharmeṣvabhiyujyante yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthānam ||
S04n462:48: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃchādya samaṃ vāri pramuñcati,
S04n462:50: yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthāmaṃ ca te tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vāryāpibanti,
S04n462:52: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
S04n462:53: sarvaḥ sa dharma ekaraso yaduta vimuktiraso virāgaraso nirodharasaḥ sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaḥ |
S04n462:54: tatra kāśyapa ye te sattvāstathāgatasya dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śṛṇvanti dhārayanti abhisaṃyujyante,
S04n462:55: na te ātmanātmānaṃ jānanti vā vedayanti vā budhyanti vā |
S04n462:57: tathāgata eva kāśyapa tān sattvāṃstathā jānāti,
S04n462:70: tathāgata eva kāśyapa tatra pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣadarśī yathā ca darśī teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmiṣu sthitānāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamānām |
S04n462:71: so'haṃ kāśyapa ekarasadharma viditvā yaduta vimuktirasaṃ nirvṛtirasaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ nityaparinirvṛtamekabhūmikamākāśagatikamadhimuktiṃ sattvānāmanurakṣamāṇo na sahasaiva sarvajñajñānaṃ saṃprakāśayāmi |
S04n462:72: āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā yūyaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ tathāgatasya na śaknutha avataritum |
S04n462:75: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamāna imā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n462:79: rahasyaṃ cāpi dhārenti na ca bhāṣanti prāṇinām ||2 ||
S04n462:80: durbodhyaṃ cāpi tajjñānaṃ sahasā śrutva bāliśāḥ |
S04n462:81: kāṅkṣāṃ kuryuḥ sudurmedhāstato bhraṣṭā bhrameyu te ||3 ||
S04n462:86: so ca vārisya saṃpūrṇo vidyunmālī mahāmbudaḥ |
S04n462:92: iha yā kāci medinyāṃ jātā oṣadhayo bhavet |
S04n462:95: parvate kandare caiva nikuñjeṣu ca yadbhavet ||10 ||
S04n462:109: yāsāṃ ca yad yādṛśakaṃ ca bījam |
S04n462:135: na kaści vidveṣu na rāgu vidyate ||21 ||
S04n462:137: premā ca doṣaśca na me kahiṃcit |
S04n462:162: anyā ca madhyā mahatī ca oṣadhī
S04n462:198: drumā pi vā te ca mahādrumā vā
S04n462:225: te śrāvakāḥ sarvi na enti nirvṛtim |
S04n462:228: punaraparaṃ kāśyapa tathāgataḥ sattvavinaye samo na cāsamaḥ |
S04n462:229: tadyathā kāśyapa candrasuryaprabhā sarvalokamavabhāsayati kuśalakāriṇamakuśalakāriṇaṃ cordhvāvasthitamadharāvasthitaṃ ca sugandhi durgandhi,
S04n462:230: sā sarvatra samaṃ prabhā nipatati na viṣamam,
S04n462:231: evameva kāśyapa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñajñānacittaprabhā sarveṣu pañcagatyupapanneṣu sattveṣu yathādhimuktiṃ mahāyānikapratyekabuddhayānikaśrāvakayānikeṣu saddharmadeśanā samaṃ pravartate |
S04n462:232: na ca tathāgatasya jñānaprabhāyā ūnatā vā atiriktatā vā yathāpuṇyajñānasamudāgamāya saṃbhavati |
S04n462:236: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat-yadi bhagavan na santi trīṇi yānāni,
S04n462:237: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyutpanne'dhvani śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptiḥ prajñapyate?
S04n462:238: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapametadavocat-tadyathā kāśyapa kumbhakāraḥ samāsu mṛttikāsu bhājanāni karoti |
S04n462:244: atha ca dravyaprakṣepamātreṇa bhājanānāṃ nānātvaṃ prajñāyate |
S04n462:245: evameva kāśyapa ekamevedaṃ yānaṃ yaduta buddhayānam |
S04n462:246: na dvitīyaṃ na tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate ||
S04n462:247: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat-yadyapi bhagavan sattvā nānādhimuktayo ye traidhātukānniḥsṛtāḥ,
S04n462:248: kiṃ teṣāmekaṃ nirvāṇamuta dve trīṇi vā?
S04n462:251: tena hi kāśyapa upamāṃ te kariṣyāmi |
S04n462:254: sa evaṃ brūyānna santi suvarṇadurvaṇāni rūpāṇi,
S04n462:260: athānye puruṣāstasya jātyandhasya puruṣasya purata evaṃ vadeyuḥ-santi suvarṇadurvarṇāni rūpāṇi,
S04n462:266: sa ca jātyandhaḥ puruṣasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na śraddadhyāt,
S04n462:270: tasyaivaṃ syāt-tasya puruṣasya pūrvapāpena karmaṇā vyādhirutpannaḥ |
S04n462:272: te sarve caturvidhāḥ-vātikāḥ paittikāḥ ślaiṣmikāḥ sāṃnipātikāśca |
S04n462:273: atha sa vaidyastasya vyādhervyupaśamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarupāyaṃ cintayet |
S04n462:276: santi tu himavati parvatarāje catasra oṣadhayaḥ |
S04n462:283: atha sa vaidyastasmin jātyandhe kāruṇyamutpādya tādṛśamupāyaṃ cintayet,
S04n462:289: ārāgya ca kāṃciddantaiḥ kṣoditāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt,
S04n462:297: sa pratilabdhacakṣurbahiradhyātmaṃ dūre āsanne ca candrasūryaprabhāṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahān sarvarūpāṇi ca paśyet |
S04n462:306: te taṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ-kevalaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā cakṣuḥ pratilabdham |
S04n462:311: tamenamevaṃ vadeyuḥ-yadā tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa antargṛhaṃ niṣaṇṇo bahiranyāni rūpāṇi na paśyasi,
S04n462:313: nāpi te ye sattvāḥ snigdhacittā vā drugdhacittā vā |
S04n462:315: bherīśaṅkhādīnāṃ śabdaṃ na prajānāsi, na śṛṇoṣi |
S04n462:321: tatsādhu bhoḥ puruṣa yadandhakāraṃ tatprakāśamiti saṃjānīṣe,
S04n462:323: atha sa puruṣastān ṛṣīnevaṃ vadet-ka upāyaḥ,
S04n462:324: kiṃ vā śubhaṃ karma kṛtvedṛśīṃ prajñāṃ pratilabheya,
S04n462:326: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasya puruṣasyaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ-yadīcchasi,
S04n462:332: araṇye vasan ekāgracitto lokatṛṣṇāṃ prahāya pañcābhijñāḥ prāpnuyāt |
S04n462:337: iti hi kāśyapa upamaiṣā kṛtā asyārthasya vijñaptaye |
S04n462:345: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
S04n462:347: tathāgatastu karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātukānniḥsṛtaḥ piteva priye ekaputrake karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātuke'vatīrya sattvān saṃsāracakre paribhramataḥ saṃpaśyati |
S04n462:350: dṛṣṭvā ca jānāti-amī sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ kṛtvā mandadveṣāstīvrarāgāḥ,
S04n462:356: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgata upāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānāni deśayati |
S04n462:357: tatra yathā te ṛṣayaḥ pañcābhijñā viśuddhacakṣuṣaḥ,
S04n462:358: evaṃ bodhisattvā bodhicittānyutpādya anutpattikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante ||
S04n462:365: yathā catasra oṣadhayastathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitanirvāṇadvāraṃ ca draṣṭavyam |
S04n462:368: evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayitvā sattvā avidyāṃ nirodhayanti |
S04n462:370: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |
S04n462:371: evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ na kuśale tiṣṭhati na pāpe ||
S04n462:377: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate-na santyapare dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ |
S04n462:383: sa utpannabodhicitto na saṃsārasthito na nirvāṇaprāpto bhavati |
S04n462:384: so'vabudhya traidhātukaṃ daśasu dikṣu śūnyaṃ nirmitopamaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnamarīcipratiśrutkopamaṃ lokaṃ paśyati |
S04n462:385: sa sarvadharmānanutpannānaniruddhān abaddhānamuktān atamondhakārān naprakāśān paśyati |
S04n462:388: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n462:392: sarvasattvān vinayate na conā naiva cādhikā ||46 ||
S04n462:393: yathā kulālo mṛdbhāṇḍaṃ kurvan mṛtsu samāsvapi |
S04n462:396: mṛdamekāṃ sa gṛhṇāti kurvan bhāṇḍāni bhārgavaḥ ||48 ||
S04n462:397: yādṛk prakṣipyate dravyaṃ bhājanaṃ tena lakṣyate |
S04n462:409: jātyandhe tu mahāvaidyaḥ kāruṇyaṃ saṃniveśya ha |
S04n462:413: dantaiḥ saṃcūrṇya kāṃcittu piṣṭvā cānyāṃ tathāparām |
S04n462:417: evaṃ sattvā mahājñānā jātyandhāḥ saṃsaranti hi |
S04n462:429: maharṣayo yathā tasmai karuṇāṃ saṃniveśya vai |
S04n462:434: so adyāpi na jānāti kutastvaṃ vetsyase'lpadhīḥ ||67 ||
S04n462:436: taṃ śrotuṃ na samartho'si prāgevānyaṃ vidūrataḥ ||68 ||
S04n462:438: te na śakyaṃ tvayā jñātumabhimānaḥ kuto'sti te ||69 ||
S04n462:439: krośamātre'pi gantavye padavīṃ na vinā gatiḥ |
S04n462:440: mātuḥ kukṣau ca yadvṛttaṃ vismṛtaṃ tattadeva te ||70 ||
S04n462:441: abhijñā yasya pañcaitāḥ sa sarvajña ihocyate |
S04n462:450: upāya eṣa buddhānāṃ vadanti yadimaṃ nayam |
S04n462:452: tryadhvajñānamanantaṃ ca ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ |
S04n462:454: bodhicittaṃ ca ye cānye dharmā nirvāṇagāminaḥ |
S04n462:463: na caitān prekṣate nāpi kiṃciddharmaṃ vipaśyati ||81 ||
S04n462:466: sarvadharmāḥ samāḥ sarve samāḥ samasamāḥ sadā |
